fields.summary: iOS7: Tapping Tab Orphans Windows on Tab's Stack
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.3.v20130912132758, 3.1.3.v20130913160104
Javascript Engine: V8
Platform & version: iOS 7.0
Device Details: iOS simulator - 7.0
Host Operating System: OS X 10.8.5
Titanium Studio version: 3.1.2.201308091617

comments.body:
Verified the Fix with:
Appcelerator Studio:Â 3.1.3.201309132456
SDK: 3.1.3.v20130916153052
acs:1.0.6
alloy:1.2.2-cr
npm:1.3.2
titanium:3.1.2
titanium-code-processo:1.0.2
OSX: 10.8.4
Xcode:5.0 GM seed
Devices: Simulator(v7.0),ipod Touch2(v7.0)

Tapping the tab's button now closes every window that is open on that tab's stack, not just the current window.Working Fine.
